statements: SELECT * FROM AirQualitySensorData;
SELECT location, temperature FROM AirQualitySensorData WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, date_time FROM AirQualitySensorData WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT * FROM AirQualitySensorData ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS average_temperature, AVG(humidity) AS average_humidity FROM AirQualitySensorData;
SELECT * FROM AirQualitySensorData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT location, temperature FROM AirQualitySensorData WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, date_time, location, temperature, humidity FROM AirQualitySensorData WHERE temperature < 20 AND humidity > 60 ORDER BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM AirQualitySensorData WHERE date_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM AirQualitySensorData WHERE location LIKE '%Indoor%';
SELECT * FROM air_quality_sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location, temperature FROM air_quality_sensors WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT sensor_name, location, co_level FROM air_quality_sensors WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY co_level DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location, humidity, temperature FROM air_quality_sensors WHERE co_level < 0.1 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT AVG(co_level), MAX(humidity), MIN(temperature) FROM air_quality_sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, co_level FROM air_quality_sensors WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY sensor_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM air_quality_sensors WHERE humidity < 50 AND location LIKE 'Living%' ORDER BY location;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM air_quality_sensors WHERE humidity > 60 AND temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT AVG(co_level) AS average_co_level, MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature FROM air_quality_sensors GROUP BY location HAVING max_temperature > 30;
SELECT sensor_name, humidity_threshold FROM air_purifier_settings WHERE fan_speed IS NULL OR temperature_threshold < 25;
SELECT * FROM AirQualitySensorData;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM AirQualitySensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM AirQualitySensorData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM AirQualitySensorData WHERE humidity < 60 ORDER BY humidity ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM AirQualitySensorData GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM AirQualitySensorData WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM AirPurifierSettings WHERE target_temperature > 20;
SELECT sensor_id, time_started, time_ended FROM AirPurifierHistory ORDER BY time_started DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM AirQualitySensorData WHERE temperature >= 25 AND humidity <= 60;
SELECT sensor_id, time_started, time_ended FROM AirPurifierHistory WHERE sensor_id = 2 ORDER BY time_started ASC;
SELECT * FROM AirQualitySensorData;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM AirQualitySensorData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT room_id, sensor_id, room_name, location_details FROM RoomSensorLocation WHERE room_name LIKE '%Living%';
SELECT system_id, model, purchase_date FROM AirPurifierSystem ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT alert_id, sensor_id, alert_type, timestamp FROM SensorAlerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical';
SELECT * FROM AirQualitySensorData;
SELECT room_name, location_details FROM RoomSensorLocation WHERE room_id = 1;
SELECT model, purchase_date FROM AirPurifierSystem WHERE AI_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT sensor_id, alert_type, alert_message FROM SensorAlerts WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity, air_quality_index FROM AirQualitySensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM SensorData;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM SensorData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT room_name, room_location FROM RoomData WHERE room_location = 'Living Room';
SELECT purifier_name, room_name FROM AirPurifier JOIN RoomData ON AirPurifier.room_id = RoomData.room_id;
SELECT user_id, preferred_temperature, preferred_humidity FROM UserSettings;
SELECT * FROM SensorData;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT room_name, room_location FROM RoomData WHERE room_location = 'Living Room';
SELECT purifier_name, room_name FROM AirPurifier INNER JOIN RoomData ON AirPurifier.room_id = RoomData.room_id;
SELECT user_id, preferred_temperature, preferred_humidity FROM UserSettings WHERE preferred_temperature > 25;
